name: STK::modular
short_description:
Tools to be used with Perry Cook and Gary Scavone's Synthesis Toolkit (STK).

STK::Modular is a modular wrapper around STK. It provides scripting languages like Python and Lua a modular interface around Audio DSP units in STK. You connect modules together much like a modular synthesizer with patch cords.

STK::Wrap is a python wrapper around STK with a sample audio driver for doing real-time audio in python using STK. 

Stk::Network is a simple MIDI network server that can be used to send midi messages over a network to a device. The server system controls the midi devices and handles sending the network data to the physical (or virtual) midi ports. There is an example script in Python how to use the server.
